group_1.narration: Several days after their visit to Walnut's...

group_1.textRight: Here we are!
This place should be big enough, right?

group_1.textLeft: Wow...so, what am I supposed to do, anyway?

group_1.textRight: Let me explain!
Emiri...you're just perfect!
You could make a fantastic counselor!
Yes, talking to you seems to make people@feel better.
First of all, you're positive, and you don't@say anything too complicated...
And sometimes you just suddenly hit@the nail right on the head!

group_1.textLeft: Hit the nail on the head...?

group_1.textRight: Err, ummm...@Like you hit the sweet spot?

group_1.textLeft: I hit the sweet spot...@Oh,[chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_11] like a home run!
But I don't remember@hitting a homer, though...

group_1.textRight: You sure did!@At Manaka's restaurant!
That's right!@Her father loved her new recipe...
It's a huge hit!@Now there are lines to get into the place!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, so it's a grand slam, huh!@I'm like, so happy for her!

group_1.textRight: And that just proves it!@You've got a knack!
When I saw how you helped out Manaka...
I thought it would be great [chara:101301:motion_11]if we@could introduce you to more people!
She wants to open up a counseling room here!
A counseling room!
People with troubles come here,@[chara:101301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]then you talk to them and help them...
Isn't that a great idea?@What's better than helping people?!
Of course, we can only do it if we have@your okay, Emiri... So what do you say?

group_1.textLeft: Hang on a sec!@...So you mean...

group_1.textRight: Yes!
Well, err, like I said...
You just have to talk with a bunch of people![chara:101301:motion_10:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh! That's it?@All I gotta do is chat?

group_1.textRight: Exactly!@During your free time!

group_1.textLeft: So then...@This'll be[chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] like a chat room!

group_1.textRight: Yes! Yes!@[chara:101301:lipSynch_0][freeze:0.5][chara:101301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_10:lipSynch_1]A chat room!

group_1.textLeft: And like, different people from @like wherever will just show up?

group_1.textRight: All right!
Thanks so much!

group_1.textLeft: Talking to new people is totes fun!@I'm, like, super stoked!

group_1.textRight: I'm so glad!
Okay then, let's get started!@I've got someone I want you to meet!
She should be here soon...@[chara:300401:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json:motion_000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah, here she is!
Hey!@Hello!
There you are!
Ah, nice to meet you.
My name's [textRed:Akira Shinobu].
